title: Proposal: Wolfram Language Testing Module for AgentGladiator Stability

This module will provide a rigorous, automated testing suite to improve AgentGladiator stability and reduce operational failures. The Wolfram Language's capabilities will be utilized for comprehensive simulation and automated analysis, preventing the continuous restarts currently observed.
